verses.content: LALPA chun Mosie a biek a,
“Midian mihai chungah Israel thlahai phuba la rawh; chu zoa chun i chihai kuomah ṭhuoi ni tâng i tih,” tiin.
Chuongchun, Mosie chun mipui- hai chu a biek a, “Midian mihai chunga LALPA phubalâkna thaw dinga Midian mihai chu thawha indo dingin nangni laia mi inrâlthuom rawhai se.
Israel hnam po pohai laia hnam tina mi sâng khat pei indonaah in fe ding a nih,” tiin.
Chuongchun, Israel mihai sâng tamtak laia inthawkin, hnam tina inthawkin sâng khat seng indonaa fe dingin sipai sîng khat le sâng hni an the suok a.
Chuongchun, Mosie chun chi tina inthawka sâng khat seng le thiempu Eleazar naupa Phinehas hmun in- thienga bûrlebêlhai, thupêk vêlna dinga tawtawrâwthai chawiin in- donaa chun ân fetir a.
Chun, LALPAIN Mosie thu a pêk angin, Midian mihai chu an do a, pasal po po an that a.
An mi thathai laia chun Midian mihai lalhai khawm an ṭhang veh a; Midian mihai lal panga Evi, Rekem, Zur, Hur le Reba hai, Beor naupa Balaam khawm kâwlhnâmin an that a.
Israel thlahai chun Midian mi nuhmei le naupanghai chu salah an ṭhuoi a, chun, an ram po pohai, an berâm ruol po pohai, an thuom- hnawhai po po chu râllâk sum dingin an lâk a.
An umna khuo po pohai, an riebûkhai po po an raw vawng a.
Mihriem le ran, sal le râllâk sum po po an fepui vawng a.
Chun, salhai, manhai, râllâk sumhai chu Mosie le Eleazar le Israel thla pungkhâwmhai kuoma Jeriko zâwn Jordan vapang Moab phai an riebûka chun an hung intlun a.
Mosie le thiempu Eleazar le pungkhâwmhai po po chun riebûk puoah an lo va tuok a.
Chun, Mosie chu sipai hotuhai, indonaa inthawka hunghai chunga chun a lunginsen a.
Chuongchun, Mosie chun an kuomah, “Nuhmei chu damin in la hla vawng maw?
Ngai ta u, Balaam remruot chun Peor chungchâng thuah Israel thlahai chu LALPA chunga bawsiet- na suktlungtuhai hieng hi an nih, LALPA mi pungkhâwmhai chunga khan hri ân lêng ta kha.
Chuleiin, naupang laia pasal ta phawt chu that unla, nuhmei mi pâwl taphawt chu that bawk ro.
Nuhmei naupang mi la pâwl naw po po chu in ta dingin hla ro.
Chun, khawhnâwmah ni sari riek unla, tukhawm mi that le mithi tâwk taphawt chu ni thum ni le ni sari niin inthien ro, nangni le in salhai khawm.
Chun, thuomhnaw hrim hrim le savuna thil siem hrim hrim dâm, kêl hmula thil siem po po dâm, thinga siemhai po po chungthua chu inthien ding a nih,” a ta.
Chun, thiempu Eleazar chun indonaa fe indo mihai kuoma chun, “Hi hi LALPAIN Mosie thu a pêk dân thuruot chu a nih;
iengkhawm ni sienla, rângka- chak dâm, tangkaruo dâm, dâr dâm, thîr dâm, rângva dâm, suon dâm;

iengkhawm meia rawha se theilo chu meiah thawl thleng in ta, chuongchun, hung inthieng tâng a tih; iengkhawm ni sienla, inthienna tuia sukthieng ding a nih; chun, meia raw tuor theilo po chu tuiah in thawl thleng ding a nih.
Chun, a ni sari ni chun in puon sâwp in ta, chun, hung inthien in ta, chu zoa chun riebûkah in hung lût ding a nih,” a ta.
LALPA chun Mosie a biek a,
“Nang le thiempu Eleazar leh, pungkhâwmhai pahnam ṭhuoituhai leh râllâk suma an lâk mihriemhai le ranhai chu tiem vawng unla,
râllâk sum chu hmun hniah ṭhe unla, indonaa fe indo mihai ta dingin le, pungkhâwmhai ta dingin.

Indonaa fe râl kâp mia inthawk chun LALPA ta dinga sie pêk ding suktum pei unla, thil hring za nga peiah pakhat mihriema inthawk dâm, bâwnga inthawk dâm, sabeng- tunga inthawk dâm, berâm ruola inthawk dâmin.
Chuonga a chenve an changa inthawk chun la unla, LALPA ta dinga athêna thên thilinhlâna dingin thiempu Eleazar pe ro.

Chun, a chenve Israel thlahai chanpuol chu sâwmnga peiah pa- khat suktum la, mihriema inthawk dâm, bâwnga inthawk dâm, sa- bengtunga inthawk dâm, berâm ruola inthawk dâm, ran ruola inthawk dâmin; chuongchu LALPA biekbûk enkawltu Levi mihai pe rawh,” a ta.
Chuongchun, LALPAIN Mosie thu a pêk ang chun Mosie le thiempu Eleazar chun an thawh a.
Sipaihaiin an lâk râllâk sum tiem loin an lâk chu berâm nuoi ruk sîng sari le sâng nga,
bâwng sîng sari le sâng hni;
sabengtung sîng ruk le sâng khat,
mihriem chu nuhmei pasal la pâwl ngailo sîng thum le sâng hni an nih.
Chun, a zâtve indonaa fehai chanvo chu, berâm nuoi thum sîng thum sâng sari le za nga a na;
chun, LALPA ta dinga chanvo berâm chu za ruk sâwmsari panga.
Bâwng chu sîng thum le sâng ruk a na, chutaka LALPA chanvo chu sâwmsari pahni a nih.
Sabengtung chu sîng thum le za nga a na, chutaka LALPA chanvo chu sâwmruk pakhat a nih.
Mihriem chu sîng khat le sâng ruk an na, chutaka LALPA chanvo mihriem chu sâwmthum le pahni an nih.
LALPAIN Mosie thu a pêk angin chanvo LALPA ta dinga a thêna thên thilinhlân chu Mosie chun thiempu Eleazar chu a pêk a.
Mosien râlkâp mihaia inthawka a sem Israel mihai chanvo chu–
mipui chanvo a zâtve chu– berâm nuoi thum sîng thum sâng sari le za nga,
bâwng sîng thum le sâng ruk,
sabengtung sîng thum le za nga,
mihriem sîng khat le sâng ruk an na.
Israel chanvo a zâtvea inthawk chun Mosie chun mihriem le ran sâwmnga peiah pakhat a lâk a, LALPA thupêk angin LALPA biekbûk enkawltu Levi mihai chu a pêk a.
Chun, sipaihai chunga hotu, sâng chunga hotuhai, za chunga hotuhai chun Mosie an va hnai a.
Mosie kuomah, “I siehlawhai hin kan kuta um indo mihai chu kan tiem a, tukhawm a kim naw kan um nawh a,

kan hringna ta dinga LALPA hmaa intlanna siemna dingin LALPA ta dinga thilinhlân ding miin an nei zâwng, rângkachaka siem incheina thil, kebunhai, bânbunhai, hming- namna kutsebihai, nabêhai, ṭhihai dâm khawm kan hung lâk a,” an tih a.
Chun, Mosie le thiempu chun rângkachaka siem an thuom pohai chu an lâk a.
Sâng chunga hotu le za chunga hotuhai rângkachak LALPA kuoma a thêna thên thilinhlâna an inhlân po po chu shekel sîng khat sâng ruk za sari le sâwmnga a nih.
(Râlkâp mihai chun an râllâk sumhai chu mâni ta seng dinga la an na).
Chun, Mosie le thiempu Eleazar chun sâng chunga hotu le za chunga hotuhai rângkachak chu an lâk a, Israel thlahai hriet zingna dingin intuokna puon inah LALPA hmaah an hung lâk a.
